result.execSummary:
The defendant Westleigh Sabastian Poole was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid within 60 days of prison release, includes DNA surcharge.

***AMENDED***
Per Judge Scott R. Needham May 18, 2015 - Amend JOC to "0" days credit.

Consecutive to any other sentence Defendant is serving.
Consecutive to:

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Michael E. Nieskes DF ATTY: Donald J. Schwab DF: Westleigh Sabastian Poole appeared in custody. Case called at 2:30. ADA Nieskes updates the court. Court questions the state as to recommendations. ADA Nieskes believes this recommendation is in the public interest. Atty. Schwab agrees with recommendations. Court reads charge and maximum penalty to amended charge of 4th degree sexual assault. DE pleads G   to the amended charge. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty to amended charge of 4th degree sexual assault 940.225 (3m).  Sentencing arguments. DE makes statement. Crt orders: Sentence Imposed with conditions. 
-  9 months St. Croix County Jail  consecutive to any other term DE is serving. 
   145 days credit against sentence
- cost to be paid within 60 days of prison release (includes DNA surcharge)
Plea hearing on February 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, S.L.D. dob 7/23/1999 or her family or any female under the age of 18 years old.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-Not to use or access the internet.


Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson.ADA:   M. Hartung. DF ATTY: Donald J. Schwab DF:  Westleigh Sabastian Poole appeared from jail. Case called at 1:14. Court reviews file.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Plea hearing on December 22, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Alexis McKinley,  DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab,  DF:  Westleigh Sabastian Poole appeared from jail. Called at 3:36 p.m. Atty Schwab states an agreement has been made - amending charge to Class A Mis. Court does not accept the plea agreement at this time and would like to review the agreement. Bond continues in form and amount. Court resets Plea Hearing.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 22, 2014 at 01:15 pm.
Plea hearing on December 1, 2014 at 03:30 pm.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Carey, ADA: Michael E. Nieskes  DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab  DF:  Westleigh Sabastian Poole appeared from jail.  Case called at 8:16 am.  State advises that revocation warrant has been received for the underlying felony, 24 months pending.  Atty Nieskes requests plea date on this case/charge, which will be amended to a misdemeanor.  Def is in custody on that revocation.  Bond continues.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 1, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
Filed by ADA Nieskes. km
Appointing Atty Schwab. km

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Scobey. ADA:   Michael E. Nieskes   DF ATTY:  Donald J. Schwab   DF:  Westleigh Sabastian Poole appeared from jail. Set for preliminary. Case called at 11:11 a.m. Preliminary waiver filed by Atty Schwab. Court questions DE. Court finds DE freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waives preliminary. Court accepts waiver, finds probable cause and binds DE over for trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 24, 2014 at 08:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 27, 2014 at 11:00 am.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, S.L.D. dob 7/23/1999 or her family or any female under the age of 18 years old.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-Not to use or access the internet.


Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
